item.title: COP29 clinches $300 billion climate finance deal
item.description: Countries agreed on Sunday to an annual finance target of $300 billion to help poorer countries deal with the impacts of climate change.

item.title: Bitcoin vs. gold: State Street worries the crypto rally's allure is distracting precious metal investors
item.description: State Street Global Advisors' George Milling-Stanley warns cryptocurrency plays do not offer the stability of gold.

item.title: How tech bros bought 'America's most pro-crypto Congress ever'
item.description: Crypto showed up in force this election cycle, raising tens of millions to vote out the industry's critics and vote in its friends.

item.title: Welcome to the mullet market: Steady benchmarks in the front, crypto party in the back
item.description: Mike Santoli describes how while the headline benchmark stock indexes have been all business, remaining calmly firm in an orderly uptrend

item.title: Goldman Sachs is bullish on these stocks heading into December and the new year
item.description: Goldman Sachs named a host of stocks that investors should buy as 2024 winds down.
